hanzi-su-wiki:
効

Значения

Действовать, оказывать действие; эффект, результат

Мнемоника

Напрягать силы 力 во время половой связи 交, чтобы получить качественное потомство. Результат, эффект.

Варианты

效
purpleculture_pinyin:
xiào
Japanese variant of 效
Японский вариант эффекта
rtega_mnemonic:
効効RSefficacious, effectiveness, to toil, to serve in the army
  • forces 力 being joined 交 in order to be efficacious
heisig_constituent: merit, mingle, top hat, father, power, muscle, arnold
heisig_story: Mingle . . . power. Note the distinct connotations that separate merit from achievement (Frame 927).
koohiiStory1: Mingling with the powerful can bring you success, bypassing the need for any merit.
koohiiStory2: There is great merit in mingling with the powerful.
jp_example_words:
効き目(ききめ): effect, virtue, efficacy, impression
効率(こうりつ): efficiency
無効(むこう): invalid, no effect, unavailable
効く(きく): be effective
効果(こうか): effect, effectiveness, efficacy, result
効力(こうりょく): effect, efficacy, validity, potency
有効(ゆうこう): validity, availability, effectiveness
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you mix different types of power you'll produce something effective.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: It doesn't matter what power you mix, because all power is strong. No matter what you use this mixed power on, it will be effective. Imagine some situations where you mix power with power.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The most effective mix of two powers is two こういちs. Take one, mix it with another, and you have something with immeasurable power. You use it to attack that animal-like creature. It's super effective!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: こういちs punch attack was super effective against that Pikurchort.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if you make an effort (力) to mix (交) it could be effective

効字的基本解释

効
xiào
同“效”③。

効字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tóng］
［《廣韻》徒紅切，平東，定。］
(1)相同，一样。
(2)谓等同，混同。
(3)与……相同。
(4)齐一，统一。
(5)谓共同参与某事。
(6)共，共一个。
(7)聚集；会合。
(8)古代天下四方诸侯毕至朝见天子之礼。
(9)指同盟之国。
(10)指同位之人。
(11)和谐；和睦。
(12)指和平、安定。
(13)赞同，同意。
(14)和。指依照别人诗词的题材、体裁或韵作诗词。唐杜甫有《奉同郭给事汤东灵湫作》、《同元使君舂陵行》、《同豆卢峰贻主客李员外贤子棐知字韵》等诗，仇兆鳌注：“同，和也。”又，前蜀韦庄有《岁晏同左生作》诗。
(15)通。指男女通奸。
(16)通。串通。
(17)副词。共同，一起。
(18)介词。引进共同行动者。
(19)介词。引进动作的对象。
(20)介词。引进比较的对象。
(21)介词。表示与某事有无关联。
(22)连词。表示联合关系。跟连词“和”相同。
(23)通“童”。光秃秃。
(24)用同

効字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【力字部】　効； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页147第12
【唐韻】胡敎切【集韻】後敎切【韻會】後學切【正韻】胡孝切，?音校。【玉篇】俗效字。【集韻】象也，功也。【韻會】效驗也。【前漢·蘇武傳】殺身自効。【正韻】古惟从攵，無从力者。後人傳寫，承訛旣久，相承用之。

考證：〔【正韻】古惟从文，無从力者。〕　謹照原文从文改从攵
効字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
効字的起名意思

1、成果，功用；2、摹仿；3、尽，致，送，献出。

Basic explanation of words
effect
xiào

effect
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tóng］
["Guangyun" Tu Hongqi, Pingdong, Ding. ]
(1) Same, same.
(2) It is said that they are equal or confusing.
(3) Same as...
(4) Unity, unity.
(5) It means to participate in something together.
(6) Total, one in total.
(7) Gather; rendezvous.
(8) In ancient times, the princes of the Quartet in the world met the emperor in the court.
(9) Refers to allied countries.
(10) Refers to the same person.
(11) Harmony; harmony.
(12) Refers to peace and stability.
(13) Agree, agree.
(14) And. Refers to composing poems according to the theme, genre or rhyme of other people's poems. Tang Dufu has poems such as "Feng Tong Guo Ge Shi Tang Dong Lingqiu", "Tong Yuan Envoy to Chong Ling", "Tong Dou Lu Feng Yi host and guest Li Yuan Wai Xian Zi Di Zhi Zhi Yun" and other poems, Qiu Zhaoao's note: "Tong , He Ye." Also, there is a poem "Sui Yan Tong Zuo Sheng" in Wei Zhuang of the former Shu.
(15) Pass. Refers to adultery between men and women.
(16) Pass. Collusion.
(17) Adverbs. Together, together.
(18) Prepositions. Introduce common actors.
(19) Prepositions. Introduce the object of the action.
(20) Prepositions. Introduce objects for comparison.
(21) Prepositions. Indicates whether it is related to something.
(22) Conjunctions. Indicates a joint relationship. Same as the conjunction "和".
(23) Through "children". Bald.
(24) Use the same

effect
Name meaning
1. Achievement, function; 2. Imitate; 3. Make, send, give, and give.
xiào
яп. вм. 效
Radicals: 交, 力  (mix, power)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you mix different types of power you'll produce something effective.
It doesn't matter what power you mix, because all power is strong. No matter what you use this mixed power on, it will be effective. Imagine some situations where you mix power with power.
Reading Mnemonic
The most effective mix of two powers is two こういちs. Take one, mix it with another, and you have something with immeasurable power. You use it to attack that animal-like creature. It's super effective!
こういちs punch attack was super effective against that Pikurchort.
